product_name: Princeton Tec Amp 1L Flashlight with Accessories
long_description: The compact Princeton Tec Amp 1L flashlight is a handy light for stashing in your car, or attaching to a key chain or pack for use when you need it most. High-output LED throws a bright, narrow beam up to 58m (190 ft.); LED outputs 45 lumens. Clip a carabiner (sold separately) to the round opening and you can easily carry the Amp 1L on a key chain or pack strap. Waterproof to 100m (333 ft.), the Amp 1L can also be used as a back-up dive light. Snap on the included cone to convert the flashlight into a marker light when you're diving. Round opening has a built-in bottle opener so you can enjoy a refreshing beverage when you get back to camp. Princeton Tec Amp 1L flashlight operates for up to 72 hrs. on 2 AAA batteries, included.
short_description: The compact Princeton Tec Amp 1L flashlight is a handy light for stashing in your car, or attaching to a key chain or pack for use when you need it most.
